Text: If this is the real 20th anniversary remaster they botched the hell out of it.

This is a homemade remaster with mixed up artwork from different pressings and a cheap font/writing added, not worth the download
It has nothing to do with the forthcoming Nevermind 2011 releases !
this is bullshit...not the 20 year release...
